name: Kazuma Kiryu Gets into LEGO Speedbuilding
name_original: Kazuma Kiryu Gets into LEGO Speedbuilding
description:
• Created in 48 hours for the Mix and Jam Game Jam.

This was the first game jam I completed solo - definitely a challenge!

I didn't have quite enough time to polish everything, or remove all the bugs - but hey! It was a fun learning experience.

Known issues:

  • When bricks spawn they sometimes shoot out of the play area. Ran out of time to fix... yay physics
  • Kiryu will say "nani" even if you delivered the correct brick. Also ran out of time to finish and fix my for loop... whoopsie
  • Triggers are finnicky - give them a light tap instead of a firm press!
  • Game breaks when going back to menu after finishing :(

[REQUIRES CONTROLLER TO PLAY]

In this minigame, Kiryu Kazuma gets into speed building LEGO models. Help him build a turtle and a plane model in record time!

Features I would have liked to add:

  • Showing you which brick and how many you need for this step
  • Lives (for when wrong bricks are added)
  • Score based on time + accuracy
